channel.title: cant find game in the library
channel.description:
so i installed black mesa and im 2 hours in (on like the third chapter)
i saved it and stuff and i want to play again but i cant find it anywhere
can i reinstall without losing my save file?

item.title: cant find game in the library
item.dc:creator: Worq
item.description:
Eltripas:

Have you tried restarting your steam/computer first?

oh nevermind i fixed it myself but thanks anyway lol

Read full topic
